description: Trinkets for Elf character generation. Small trinkets weigh 10 coins. The Referee should judge the weight of larger items.

items.name: Bag of Hallucinogenic Caterpillars
items.description: A bag of caterpillars whose flesh have hallucinogenic properties.

items.name: Endless Sticky Sweets
items.description: A bag of sticky sweets that never get any smaller when sucked on.

items.name: Moonlight-Invisible Twine
items.description: A ball of silvery twine that is invisible in moonlight.

items.name: Grimalkin's Gift Yarn
items.description: A ball of yarn, gifted to you by a grateful grimalkin.

items.name: Everlasting Black Rose
items.description: A black rose that never wilts.

items.name: Mossling Cocoa Chocolate
items.description: A block of chocolate made with cocoa harvested from a mossling.

items.name: Noble's Amateur Poetry
items.description: A book of amateur poetry. You suspect the author to be a powerful Fairy noble.

items.name: Holly and Poison Ivy Crown
items.description: A crown woven from holly and poison ivy.

items.name: Moonlit Daisy
items.description: A daisy that glows in moonlight.

items.name: Elk Antler Hat
items.description: A fancy hat topped with elk antlers.

items.name: Dream Crystal Fragment
items.description: A fragment of glowing crystal that you found in a dream.

items.name: Evil Unicorn Horn Fragment
items.description: A fragment of horn from an evil unicorn.

items.name: Liquid-Annihilating Bottle
items.description: A glass bottle that annihilates any liquid poured into it.

items.name: Frozen Sister Jar
items.description: A glass jar containing the tiny, frozen form of your only sister.

items.name: Bloodstained Glass Slipper
items.description: A glass slipper, stained with blood.

items.name: Mood-Inappropriate Harp
items.description: A harp that, if left unattended, plays mood-inappropriate music with the skill of an enthusiastic amateur.

items.name: Dying Friar's Chapes
items.description: A Chapes (holy symbol of the Pluritine Church), given to you by a dying friar decades ago.

items.name: Ice Key
items.description: A key fashioned from ice. It melts in the warmth, and reforms in cold weather.

items.name: Cold Blue Flame Lantern
items.description: A lantern that burns with a cold, blue flame when lit.

items.name: Ancient Death Threat Letter
items.description: A letter promising your imminent demise, written in High Elfish. Delivered over a hundred years ago.

items.name: Mortal's Freely Given Heart
items.description: A mortal's heart, freely given.

items.name: Trapped Sunlight Crystal
items.description: A mote of sunlight, trapped in a scintillating crystal.

items.name: Honeybee Necklace
items.description: A necklace composed of honeybees.

items.name: Bottled Nightmare
items.description: A nightmare, sealed inside a bottle.

items.name: Stolen Woodgrue Pan Flute
items.description: A pan flute stolen from a woodgrue. A single pipe is missing.

items.name: Blinking Peacock Feather
items.description: A peacock feather whose eye intermittently blinks.

items.name: Distilled Dream Liquor
items.description: A pleasant dream, distilled into a liquor.

items.name: Fairy Library Loan Receipt
items.description: A receipt for a loan of four rare and expensive tomes from a Fairy library. You no longer have any of these books.

items.name: Great Knight's Scabbard
items.description: A scabbard taken from the fallen body of a great knight.

items.name: Goblin King's Name Scroll
items.description: A sealed scroll. Allegedly contains one of the Goblin King's myriad names, never spoken.

items.name: Screaming Acorn
items.description: A seemingly ordinary acorn. Screams when its cap is removed.

items.name: Centaur Horseshoes
items.description: A set of horseshoes, designed for a centaur.

items.name: Honey-Dripping Silver Spoon
items.description: A silver spoon that drips honey on command.

items.name: Queen of Blackbirds' Feather
items.description: A single crow feather, taken from the cloak of the Queen of Blackbirds.

items.name: Prophetic Skeletal Finger
items.description: A skeletal finger that scrapes and scratches at dusk. If provided with a means of making marks (e.g. dipped in ink or blood, a surface that can be scratched), it writes macabre prophecies.

items.name: Breggle Eye Bell
items.description: A small bell shaped like a breggle's eye. Faint bleating accompanies its ringing.

items.name: Clothing-Weaving Spider
items.description: A spider that slowly weaves webs in the shape of clothing.

items.name: Night Sea Spyglass
items.description: A spyglass that always shows a view of a sea at night.

items.name: Endless Liqueur Thimble
items.description: A thimble that is always magically full of sweet liqueur.

items.name: Darkness-Creating Parasol
items.description: A white-and-gold parasol that creates darkness directly underneath it.

items.name: Salivating Wolf Pelt Cloak
items.description: A wolf pelt cloak. The wolf's head is still attached and occasionally salivates.

items.name: Ancient Bronze Mask
items.description: An ancient bronze mask depicting a bearded face.

items.name: Liquid-Drawing Wine Bottle
items.description: An empty wine bottle. When held over a liquid, it draws it inside until full.

items.name: Unturnable Hourglass
items.description: An hourglass which constantly flows in one direction. It cannot be inverted.

items.name: Never-Melting Icicle
items.description: An icicle that never melts.

items.name: Ghost-Detecting Bronze Chimes
items.description: Bronze chimes that tinkle in the presence of both ghosts and strong breezes.

items.name: Preternaturally Cold Sculpting Tools
items.description: Sculpting tools, preternaturally cold to the touch.

items.name: Six Kindred Blood Vials
items.description: Six vials of blood, each drawn from a different Kindred.

items.name: Unknown Sky Star Charts
items.description: Star charts that match no sky seen from Dolmenwood.

items.name: Severed Fairy Horse Tail
items.description: The severed tail of a fairy horse.
